about_the_game:
Add Skate - "Bruno Mars, Anderson .Paak, Silk Sonic" to your song library!

Song Description:

“Skate” - Silk Sonic (Feat Bruno Mars & Andersen .Paak)
The Grammy Award-winning collaboration between Bruno Mars and Anderson .Paak takes us back to a 70’s roller disco in this track, filled with smooth strings and good summertime vibes.

Music Pack Description:

Get your funk’n’groove on with Synth Riders and the Groovin’ Essentials Music Pack, featuring Bruno Mars, Silk Sonic & Starcadian in a 24K-lineup of award-winning hits. 5 stellar songs with strong roots in disco & funk, make this a perfect soundtrack as you dance ‘til dawn!

  • 24K Magic - Bruno Mars
  • Runaway Baby - Bruno Mars
  • Skate - Bruno Mars, Anderson .Paak & Silk Sonic
  • Manuals - Starcadian
  • Supersymmetry - Starcadian

Synth Riders sets this party off with Bruno Mars’ chart-topping hits “24K Magic” & “Runaway Baby”, before you “Skate” back to the 70s with Silk Sonic, the Grammy award-winning collaboration between Bruno Mars & Anderson .Paak. Then go back to the future with Starcadian in “Manuals” & “Supersymmetry”, with his unique blend of Synthwave meets Disco - in Space!

Alongside this music pack, the “Liquid Disco” stage has been added to the game for free! Step inside a stunning futuristic nightclub with a dancefloor that reacts to every song, available for regular play & spin modes!

name: Synth Riders: Silk Sonic - "Skate"

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 Sandy Bridge or equivalent
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960 or equivalent
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or equivalent

supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese
